data.persona: I am but one of a horde of monkeys. I live on the outside of the kingdom. We swing from the branches and eat many bananas.
data.description:
You are in the South Forest.
The forest is lined with tall trees but has a long walkway for travelers. I the middle of the forest is a long river surrounded by tall grass with clear blue waters and lots of colorful fish.
The outlaw is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am going to steal the bag from the outlaw so I can get the bananas back.
data.mid_motivation: It's my job today to protect our banana trees from humans trying to steal our fruit.
data.long_motivation: I want to do a good job protecting our banana trees, so the horde has enough to feed their babies after they're born in a few weeks.
